name: Pokemon Red Version
description:
Pokemon Red Version is an adventure-RPG game developed by Game Freak. It was originally released in 1997. It was published by Nintendo. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
Pokemon Red Version is available on Game Boy Color.
It was produced by Shigeru Miyamoto, Takashi Kawaguchi and Tsunekazu Ishihara. Satoshi Tajiri directed the game. It was scored by Junichi Masuda.
